determineLevel.title: Determine Level
determineLevel.description: Test your level with us before you start, so a personalized learning model can be built for you.
determineLevel.noAttemptsDescription: Test your level with us before you start, so a personalized learning model can be built for you that identifies strengths and weaknesses. You can retake the test more than once.

actions.continueTestTooltip: This feature is under development and will be available soon.
actions.abandonedTooltip: Abandoned tests cannot be resumed or reviewed.

cancelDialog.title: Are you sure you want to cancel this test?
cancelDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Your progress in test attempt #{attemptId} will be lost.
cancelDialog.successToast: Test attempt #{attemptId} has been successfully cancelled.
cancelDialog.errorToastGeneric: Could not cancel the test. Please try again.

cancelDialog.title: Confirm Cancellation
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel test attempt #{attemptId}? This action cannot be undone.
cancelDialog.successToast: Test attempt #{attemptId} has been successfully canceled.
cancelDialog.errorToastGeneric: Failed to cancel test attempt. Please try again.

errors.fetchFailedDescription: An error occurred while loading level assessment attempts. Please try again later.

startForm.pageDescription: Choose the sections you wish to be tested on and select the appropriate number of questions to begin an accurate assessment of your current level.
startForm.title: Level Assessment Test Settings
startForm.selectSectionsAndCount: Select Sections and Number of Questions
startForm.selectSectionsDescription: Select at least one main section or subsection.

validation.atLeastOneSection: Please select at least one main section (by selecting at least one subsection).
validation.selectAtLeastOneSubsection: Please select at least one subsection.
validation.numQuestionsMin: The number of questions must be at least 5.
validation.numQuestionsMax: The number of questions must not exceed 100.

api.startError: Failed to start level assessment test. Please try again.

errors.fetchSectionsFailedDescription: We couldn't load the learning sections. Please refresh the page or try again later.
errors.noSectionsAvailableDescription: Sorry, there are currently no learning sections available to start a level assessment test.

quiz.title: Level Assessment Test
quiz.question: Question
quiz.timeOver: The time allotted for the test has ended!
quiz.testAlreadyCompletedRedirecting: This test has already been completed. Redirecting you...
quiz.noQuestionsDescription: Could not load questions for this test. The test may be invalid or an error occurred.
quiz.noQuestionsApiError: An error occurred while fetching test questions from the server.

api.answerSubmitError: Failed to submit answer for question {questionId}: {error}

cancelDialog.title: End Test?
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to end the current test? Your progress will be saved.

completeDialog.title: Submit Answers?
completeDialog.description: Are you sure you want to submit all your answers and finish the test?

questionLoadError.title: Question loading error
questionLoadError.description: The options for question {questionId} could not be loaded. Please try refreshing the page or contact support.

review.title: Review Test
review.noQuestionsInReview: There are no questions available in this review.
review.noQuestionsMatchFilter: No questions match the current filter.

errors.fetchReviewFailed: Could not load the test review. Please try again or go back.

score.title: Level Assessment Test Result
score.adviceDefault: Great performance! Keep progressing and learning.
score.adviceReviewVerbal: You need to focus more on the Verbal section. Review the related questions.
score.adviceReviewQuantitative: You need to focus more on the Quantitative section. Review the related questions.
score.noScoreDataForChart: Not enough score data to display the chart.

errors.fetchReviewFailed: Failed to load test review data. The test might be incomplete or an error occurred.

api.retakeSuccess: New test created successfully! Redirecting you...
api.retakeSuccessNewTest: New test ({attemptId}) created successfully! Redirecting you...
api.retakeError: Failed to create a new test: {error}

details.numQuestionsSelected: Number of Questions that had been selected
details.noQuestionsFound: No questions were found for this attempt.

errors.fetchDetailsFailed: Could not load the test attempt details. Please try again or go back.

determineLevel.apiError: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again.
